ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: page recent section height
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior Inside the `Page` of any `Project` if you are creating multiple `Pages` list is performing weirdly. https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/138677898/8073ed82-1953-4760-9014-b000051c8d48 ### Steps to reproduce 1. Go to your `Project` 2. Open the `Pages` 3. Inside the `Recent` tab Make sure to create as much `Pages` you want so it could get scroll ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Local

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: page list item ui on mobile view
